Posts.Content: Thank you yes the waiting is the worse take care
Posts.Title: Stage one breast cancer.

Posts.Content: Hi I have to to go and have some blue dye put in my lymph nodes tomorrow then my lumpectomy on Friday. It's such a big shook to be told you have breast cancer please just deal with one thing at a time stay off Google that's what the nurse told me she said Google is only good for making a Victoria sandwich.  If you need something to help you sleep go and speak to your doctor yours is a very early stage . Mine is stage 2 we are strong as woman keep your inner strength going xx
Posts.Title: Stage one breast cancer.

Posts.Content: Hi yes I was dignosed with stage 2 breast cancer I didn't feel any lump only I went for a mammogram. Went and had my pre assment yesterday and got my op talk this Friday then surgery on the 31st of this month took me a whaile to get over the shook of hearing I had breast cancer but there are plenty if people to talk to just rember your not on your own take care
Posts.Title: Stage one breast cancer.

Posts.Content: Goid luck with your treatment I've been told my lymph nodes will be cracked when iam in surgery
Posts.Title: Stage one breast cancer.

Posts.Content: Got my pre op on 21st for breast cancer then got to go hospital on the 30th they are going to put a tiny bit of radiation in then my surgery for a lumpectomy on the 31st.
